title: A Place to Relax
description:
Sienna was opened to create an honest, simple, relaxing and cosy space for the area of Deptford. Nothing fancy, nothing gimmicky... the idea was to just to create .. a lovely cafe. 

We do our best to use locally or UK sourced produce to not only keep our menu tip-top and fresh but also to help the local community and beyond thrive as much as possible. Our coffee is sourced from a variety of global Fair Trade coffee farms and the wine... just a mix of great reds & whites from all corners of our beautiful world. 

We love to integrate community and charity work into the day to day life of Sienna, so please do get in touch if you have any creative ideas! 

See you soon! 

Esther
name: Sienna Café
